scripts.clone-db-test: mysql -h localhost -u root < ./sql/reset-test-db.sql && mysqldump --no-data uberlike -h localhost -u root > ./sql/uberlike.sql && shx sed -i AUTO_INCREMENT=[0-9] AUTO_INCREMENT=0 ./sql/uberlike.sql && mysql uberlike_test -h localhost -u root < ./sql/uberlike.sql
scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run clone-db-test && mocha --compilers js:babel-register --reporter nyan ./src/index.js ./src/users/rider.spec.js ./src/**/*.spec.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm test && npm run delete-dist && babel ./src -d ./dist
